achievements.text: Lead corporate redesign of prapay.com utilizing Bootstrap 4, SASS, jQuery, JSON, and Knockout JS on .NET MVC 5 C#.

Lead redesign of payment process user experience for the United Kingdom prapay.com web application.  Utilized jQuery, AJAX, JSON, C#, MVC connecting to our internal APIâ€™s for functionality and SASS/Bootstrap 4 for UI and animations.
Lead front end initiative to modularize JavaScript files, and teach / implement separation of concerns and D.R.Y methodologies to junior developers.
Lead User Experience and User Design initiatives for new features with Balsamic for wireframing during concept phase, Bootstrap 4 with SASS and jQuery for rapid prototyping and final builds.
Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding.
Implemented daily team code reviews allowing team to present completed code for review or partial for guidance and collaberation.
Lead front end application development utilizing Bootstrap 3, Google Material Design Lite, AngularJS, LESS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, and Thymeleaf for applications built with Java.
Lead integration of responsive designs with single page and MVC applications.
Lead push for content delivery network to serve brand files for CSS and JavaScript for all internal applications.
Lead direction for Restful API services to deliver content to front end.
Lead wire framing mock ups for new applications.
Lead front end initiative to modularize JavaScript files, implement separation of concerns and D.R.Y methodologies.
Worked with leadership to design and develop web sites to expand the business and brand.
Developed and enhanced internal applications to increase user productivity through usability.
Sole Front End resource for all development utilizing HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap 3, JavaScript, JQUERY and Grails.
Member of the Global Asset Management team, representing the face of high quality design and development practices.
Partnered with the Software Center of Excellence architecture and engineering teams to implement UI solutions that are aligned and extend shared platforms and solutions.
Extensive JavaScript, JQUERY, and Angular JS development.

Worked closely with Senior Leadership, Management, Designers, and Developers to lead the UI/UX development of a custom 960 responsive grid system to meet their requirements for web, mobile, ASP.net and J2EE integration for their multiple ecommerce based websites including walmart.stationery.com, iprint.com, and officedepot.com.
Supporting the developers' efforts to integrate resulting product with back end development.
Various tasks and duties pertaining to ecommerce for Capital One.
Lead UI/UX design and development for multiple projects while supporting multiple teams including SSP, BAU, Servicing, EOS, and the Flex Design team.
Developed and managed SSP build book.
Worked closely with Project Managers, Business Managers, external and internal Business Units to design, develop, and maintain firedog.com.
Lead design and development for firedog.com.
Work closely with Business Owners, Managers, and Employees to design, develop, and maintain ecommerce and informational sites for small to medium sized businesses.

The design, development, expansion, and maintenance of www.firstunion.com. Ensuring team members adhered to web site style guides while performing proper coding practices and training team members when needed.
